name: part_010
file: tmp_【#バカタレ２周年記念LIVE】音楽ライブ♬　BAKATARATION PARTY【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ⧸不知火フレア⧸角巻わため】 [hQB206l932M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki, Shiranui Flare, and Tsunomaki Watame perform a cover of 'Eiyuu' by doa, playing air guitars and singing with high energy.
MC segment where the members talk about their performance, their shared love for music, and joke around about being 'business friends'.

subtitles.original: そんじゃ今からしましょうか Transformation
subtitles.english: So, shall we transform now? Transformation

subtitles.original: 弱気になって震える　明日の君はどうする？
subtitles.english:
When you're feeling weak and trembling,
what will the you of tomorrow do?

subtitles.original: 黙って下向いてちゃ聞こえない
subtitles.english: If you're silent and looking down, I can't hear you.

subtitles.original: 男なら　誰かのために強くなれ
subtitles.english: If you're a man, be strong for someone else's sake.

subtitles.original: ぶつかり合って精一杯やってみろ
subtitles.english: Clash with each other and give it your all.

subtitles.original: 泣いてもいいよ　また笑えればいい
subtitles.english: It's okay to cry, as long as you can laugh again.

subtitles.original: ただそれだけできれば　英雄さ
subtitles.english: If you can do just that, you're a hero.

subtitles.original: 男なら　誰かのために強くなれ
subtitles.english: If you're a man, be strong for someone else's sake.

subtitles.original: 歯がゆくて見てるだけじゃ始まらない
subtitles.english:
It's frustrating just watching,
nothing will start.

subtitles.original: これが正しいって言える勇気があればいい
subtitles.english:
As long as you have the courage to say
"this is right".

subtitles.original: ただそれだけできれば　英雄さ
subtitles.english: If you can do just that, you're a hero.

subtitles.original: 男なら　誰かのために強くなれ
subtitles.english: If you're a man, be strong for someone else's sake.

subtitles.original: 歯を食いしばって思いっきり守り抜け
subtitles.english: Grit your teeth and protect to the very end.

subtitles.original: 転んでもいいよ　また立ち上がればいい
subtitles.english:
It's okay to fall down,
as long as you can stand up again.

subtitles.original: ただそれだけできれば　英雄さ
subtitles.english: If you can do just that, you're a hero.

subtitles.original: Alright!
subtitles.english: Alright!

subtitles.original: はー！ということで！
subtitles.english: Haa! And with that!

subtitles.original: いやあ、暴れた！
subtitles.english: Wow, we really let loose!

subtitles.original: Thank you! Thank you! Arigatou!
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

subtitles.original: てかみんなギターかい！
subtitles.english: I mean, everyone had guitars!

subtitles.original: ギターなんだよ！
subtitles.english: They're guitars!

subtitles.original: 三本ギターかい！
subtitles.english: Three guitars!

subtitles.original: いい感じにこう、写真撮ってみる？
subtitles.english: Should we, like, try to take a nice photo?

subtitles.original: いいじゃん！ガールズバンド感かっこいい！
subtitles.english: Nice! The girls' band vibe is cool!

subtitles.original: ガールズバンド感いいよ！
subtitles.english: The girls' band vibe is good!

subtitles.original: 俺がギターだ！
subtitles.english: I'm the guitar!

subtitles.original: 俺もギターだ！
subtitles.english: I'm the guitar too!

subtitles.original: じゃあベースのつもりだ！
subtitles.english: Then I'll pretend to be the bass!

subtitles.original: じゃベース！見たベース！もっと！
subtitles.english: Then bass! Look, a bass! More!

subtitles.original: はい、それじゃギター消えろ！ポイ！ポイ！ポイ！
subtitles.english: Okay, now guitars, disappear! Pop! Pop! Pop!

subtitles.original: ということで、「英雄」でございました！
subtitles.english: And so, that was 'Eiyuu'!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: いや、楽しかったね「英雄」。
subtitles.english: Man, 'Eiyuu' was fun.

subtitles.original: 気持ちいいね！
subtitles.english: It felt great!

subtitles.original: いや、よかったよ。「Alright」がすごいみんなでできてよかったと思います。
subtitles.english:
Yeah, it was good. I think it was great
that we could all do the "Alright" together.

subtitles.original: はい！はい！ということで...
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! And with that...

subtitles.original: なんと！
subtitles.english: Behold!

subtitles.original: これで終わりなのー？
subtitles.english: Is this the end?

subtitles.original: えー？もし終わりなのー？
subtitles.english: Eh? Is it already over?

subtitles.original: まだあるよね？まだあるよね？
subtitles.english:
There's still more, right?
There's still more, right?

subtitles.original: 次が最後の曲？
subtitles.english: Is the next one the last song?

subtitles.original: ってことはさ、こういうのってさ、普段はさ、ここで告知とかあるんじゃないの？
subtitles.english:
Which means, usually in these things, aren't
there announcements or something here?

subtitles.original: あ！告知！告知！ない！
subtitles.english:
Ah! Announcements! Announcements!
There are none!

subtitles.original: ないんかい！
subtitles.english: There aren't any?!

subtitles.original: 残念！ありません！
subtitles.english: Too bad! There aren't any!

subtitles.original: なんもないんかい！
subtitles.english: There's nothing at all?!

subtitles.original: 今はないけども、また今後、バカタレあるでしょう色々と！
subtitles.english:
There aren't any right now, but there will be
more for Bakatare in the future, surely!

subtitles.original: なんかあったっけ？
subtitles.english: Was there something?

subtitles.original: おいおいおい！俺俺俺！
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, hey! Me, me, me!

subtitles.original: え？覚えてないけど...
subtitles.english: Eh? I don't remember...

subtitles.original: え？耳あるよな？長い耳ついとるよな？ふわふわのついとるよな？
subtitles.english:
Eh? You have ears, right? Long ears?
Fluffy ones?

subtitles.original: でもあの、あれだね。これからもね、二人ともよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english:
But, well, from now on too, I look forward
to working with both of you.

subtitles.original: あ、よろしくお願いいたします！
subtitles.english: Ah, I look forward to working with you too!

subtitles.original: なんで他人行儀なんだよ！
subtitles.english: Why are you being so formal?!

subtitles.original: え？ビジネスフレンドなの？
subtitles.english: Eh? Are we business friends?

subtitles.original: やだ！これからもビジネスとして仲良くやっていくんで、今後ともよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english:
No! We'll continue to get along well as business
partners, so I look forward to working with you!

subtitles.original: じゃあビジネスの心構えで...
subtitles.english: Then with a business mindset...

subtitles.original: いや、そんなことないで！
subtitles.english: No, that's not true!

subtitles.original: みんなときゃ無理って言うね！
subtitles.english:
Everyone says it's impossible to keep it
strictly business!

subtitles.original: だま... あと一曲！
subtitles.english: Shut... One more song!

subtitles.original: あと一曲でございます！
subtitles.english: There is one song left!

subtitles.original: もうこれでちょっとMCパートが終わっちゃうので、最後に一言ずつちょっと感想もらおうかな？
subtitles.english:
With this, the MC part is almost over, so maybe
we could get a few words from each of you?

subtitles.original: じゃあわためからいいかい？今日のバカタレライブどうでしたか？
subtitles.english:
Shall we start with Watame?
How was today's Bakatare Live?

subtitles.original: え！何も考えてなかった！
subtitles.english: Eh! I didn't think of anything!

subtitles.original: 何も考えずにやってたか！
subtitles.english: You were doing it without thinking?!

subtitles.original: でもやっぱ音楽っていいよね！
subtitles.english: But as I thought, music is great, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 楽しかったもー！これからもやろうでもっと！
subtitles.english: It was so fun! Let's do more from now on!

subtitles.original: やろうね！やろうね！
subtitles.english: Let's! Let's!

subtitles.original: じゃあ続いてフレア！
subtitles.english: Next, Flare!

subtitles.original: 何も考えてなかったけど、
subtitles.english: I didn't think of anything either, but...

subtitles.original: やっぱ私たちって「歌ってみた」をやりたくて集まったところもあって...
subtitles.english:
After all, we gathered because we wanted
to do song covers...

subtitles.original: で、みんな歌が好きなメンバーで集まっているのでね、これからもいっぱい歌とかも歌いたいね。
subtitles.english:
And we've gathered as members who love
singing, so I want to sing many more songs.

subtitles.original: 歌いたいね！
subtitles.english: I want to!

subtitles.original: すごい今日楽しかったし、これからも一緒に歌っていこうね。
subtitles.english:
I had a lot of fun today, so let's
keep singing together from now on.
